channel.title: ForgeFed milestones, participate and get funding
channel.description:
ForgeFed is getting NLNet funding. The funding is per milestone, so this is a good time to define our milestones and side projects, and get them discussed with NLNet.
Look at the **[plan](https://notabug.org/peers/forgefed/issues/87)**. Is there a task/project you'd like to grab? If you do, you can get funding from NLNet for it! There's a variety of open tasks and pieces to put together :)
